website_summaries.verdict: The perfect party favor to hand out the morning after your bachelorette party.
pros: Ideal size for Advil, gum, hair ties, snacks, and other small items
Quality drawstrings can be used to tie bags to water bottles
cons: Bags are quite small, won't fit a normal-sized water bottle

customer_reviews.title: ... for my bridesmaids Gift boxes and the girls absolutely loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my bridesmaids Gift boxes and the girls absolutely loved them!! It's just the bags but you can purchase all the extra stuff at a dollar store. They were roomy enough to fit a couple little things in there that would help a hangover for the next day!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: amanda velasquez

customer_reviews.title: but it did smell funny. I guess the burlap smell
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my bachelorette trip for the girls as a gift and stuffed random things inside. It was a hit, but it did smell funny. I guess the burlap smell, but it wasn't too terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvz

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable bags for travel goodies!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect goodies bags for my husband and best friends 40th Birthday! I put a few fun surprises (travel case Advil, snickers bar, chapstick, liquid IV hydration packets) in the bag for our guest and they were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jen E

customer_reviews.title: THE BRIDAL PARTY ENJOYED. I WAS ABLE TO PUT A KOZY
customer_reviews.text: CUTE, THE BRIDAL PARTY ENJOYED. I WAS ABLE TO PUT A KOZY, WITH SMALL ITEMS (TYLENOL PACKET, EXCEDRINE PACKET, TUMS, MINI HAND SANITIZER, BREATH MINTS, MINI EYE DROPS, TUMS) AS A HANGOVER BAG. IT TURNED OUT SUPER CUTE.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I wanted, but quality construction. I wanted to put the 16oz water bottle inside, but it wasn’t big enough, so I tied the bag to the bottle and it worked out fine. An 8oz bottle may have worked.
customer_reviews.author: little3inbigD

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Great small bags for bachelorette party. I filled each one with a travel size Tylenol and wrapped the string of each bag around a water bottle. Professional quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect party favor/hangover bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so cute!!! The 5x7 inch bags are the perfect size for all the items i bought. I can’t wait to give them to the bridesmaids at my sisters bachelorette party!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great goodie bags
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cute little goodie bags for my bridesmaids. I filled them with Advil, emergency c, Pedialyte packets, face mask, and Hair ties.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Villafana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for basic stuff
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest little bags ever, perfect for your wedding party for your bachelorette party. They are pretty small but still very nice and made of good quality. I’m hanging them over a bottle of water.
customer_reviews.author: Li Lanoza

customer_reviews.title: Print is not centered.
customer_reviews.text: The bags were not printed evenly. The wording is to the right of the bag. I ordered these close yo the date of a girls trip. The shipment arrived two days late (with Prime), and it’s too late to ship back and reorder, so I will embarrassingly have to hand these out. This was such a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bachelorette parties
customer_reviews.text: Lovvvveeeedddd these for a bachelorette party! They’re small but I was about to fit 2 pedialyte packets, a pack of gum, a few bandaids, a ring pop, and a small container of Advil in it. They were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bags to put hair ties, individual aspirin packets, chapstick, and Kleenex for bachelorette gifts. Perfect size and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kaegi

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute! I loved giving them out. I think they're the perfect size to throw in a travel bag for use after the bachelorette party.
customer_reviews.author: Abby H

customer_reviews.title: The guests loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Used the hangover bags for a 21st birthday party favor. I put travel mouthwash, chapstick, gum & headache medication.
customer_reviews.author: Raenae

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered these for a Bachelorette party and the girls loved them and found them super cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a Bachelorette party and the girls loved them and found them super cute. They were a bit smaller then I expected but still made do. I would order them again but would be curious if they had a slightly bigger bag as I would prb order that instead.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA DYER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any bacheloretteborty. I added snacks,Advil,hair ties, and other stuff. Perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mangers

customer_reviews.title: Typo on printing
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice it when I ordered, but it has a typo. It says "Hangover" instead of "Hangovers". We used them anyway because it was a last minute thing, and we just ended up laughing at it. Still, it would have been preferable if it was proper English.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but mine smelled a little chemically when I got them
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Costello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift bags for girls trips.
customer_reviews.text: I host an annual girls trip every year and these were perfect gift bags for some Tylenol, ear plugs, and a few packets of hydration mix.

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Using these to make hangover kits for the whole bridal party after the wedding

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. I put them in gift bags for my wedding guests at the hotel

customer_reviews.title: Very cute bags for bachelorette party!
customer_reviews.text: These were very cute and arrived quickly...They were a little smaller than I thought they would be, but I was able to fit everything I needed (hand sanitizer, altoids smalls tin, advil, and bandaids)
customer_reviews.author: cncarden

customer_reviews.title: but still a cute bag and will work out fine. Shipping was quick
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it says "hangover only last a day" instead of "hangovers" ... I'm a stickler for proper grammar ... but still a cute bag and will work out fine. Shipping was quick!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Great quality! Going in welcome bags for my daughters wedding hotel guest. So fun!

customer_reviews.title: Love them! So perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for the bachelorette party I have planned for this weekend! Perfect size to stuff with travel size products and essentials for hangover recovery!!
customer_reviews.author: Clint M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate: Make your purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my bachelorette party! I put sample packs of Advil, a 5 stick pack of gum, chapstick, and two individually wrapped band-aids and they all fit in the bag perfectly! The only reason why I rated this with 4 stars is because the tie doesn’t stay as securely closed as I would like.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and small
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but a little small. I was able to fit a few small items

customer_reviews.title: To the seller you need to do a size comparison because the way that you explain it and through your photographs makes them seem a lot bigger but at the end the day I'm happy and it will work but you really need to ...
customer_reviews.text: They're tiny but will get the job done. To the seller you need to do a size comparison because the way that you explain it and through your photographs makes them seem a lot bigger but at the end the day I'm happy and it will work but you really need to show a size compare comparison...
customer_reviews.author: Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Cute bags!
customer_reviews.text: Bridesmaids loved these bags! There was only 1 that was defective but I kept it for myself. I was able to put a good amount of little things in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved these. They are the perfect size. I fit a lot of stuff in them (see photo). Good quality and shipped fast. Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but bag is too small
customer_reviews.text: Great thought, but bag is too small! They’re getting returned!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to put travel mouthwash and travel pack of pain meds and some other small things.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute bags. Just be sure to count them when you get them. I was one short.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Product says “hangover” without the “S” and I didn’t realize ...

customer_reviews.text: Bags are adorable. The only problem is it should say hangovers only last a day. Not hangover only last a day.

customer_reviews.title: Lovvveeee it!!
customer_reviews.text: Yayyyy!!! I’m super excited about these bags. Planning to make bags for my girls trip to Jamaica. Right size to fit little trinkets.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super cute product! Well made and perfect for what I needed!

customer_reviews.title: Not what was pictured
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the bag is pretty good but I was really disappointed the bag said “bride tribe” instead of the hangover recovery kit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! They were perfect favors for the morning after a bachelor party!

customer_reviews.title: what I received looked nothing like what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Highly upset, what I received looked nothing like what is pictured. Received pink lace bags.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby M.

customer_reviews.title: English Grammar: It should really say "Hangover(s)" not Hangover
customer_reviews.text: Okay... so these are super cute and useful for little bachelorette baggies, but it wasn't until AFTER i got these, that i realized that the english on here isn't correct. It SHOULD say "Hangover(s) only last a day, memories last forever" ... oh well, nobody noticed, but for those that are sticklers on grammar, just an FYI :)
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bridal Party Gift!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. I purchased as a gift for my bridal party and gave out during my bachelorette weekend. I originally thought the 4x6 would be too small but there was plenty of space for Emergen C, Advil, Tums, Band-Aids, Pack of Gum, and 5 Hours Energy Shot with room for a couple more items.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not grammatically correct should say hangover’s plural not hangover singular doesn’t make sense. Doubt I’ll hand these out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quality too!
customer_reviews.text: So flipping cute. So after reading reviews I was skeptical In regards to the verbiage on the bags ( hangover vs. Hangovers). I gave it a try, knowing Amazon always has your back with returning. Would think by now the seller would have it corrected, and they did! Super cute bags, I used them for a bachelorette party! Good size too
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to size
customer_reviews.text: These were small but I manage to pack a fair amount of stuff in there (gum, pieces of chocolate, lip gloss, Tylenol, etc.. basically small items). Just wish they were bigger so a Gatorade could fit. Bridesmaid did love them
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product / great size
customer_reviews.text: Made the perfect favors for a bachelorette party. Everyone loved them & they fit a surprising amount inside them which was great. Was able to fit everything pictured without them looking bulky or misshapen.
customer_reviews.author: MsBowie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are a very cute idea - I purchased them as part of a 'survival kit' for my daughters wedding. I wish they were a little bigger, but I knew the size when I bought them and will make them work
customer_reviews.author: Born to Shop

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for our wedding favors... We put granola bars, advil and fruit snacks inside and then tied the bags to bottles of water. There were a couple bags in the bunch where it looked like the bag had folded over during the printing process, so the words weren't printed on all the way, but we had ordered extra so it all worked out!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my hangover kit bags!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so stinkin cute! I bought them for a bachelorette party. Just loved the quote on them. I made hangover kits, and included mini bottles of Scope, packets of Advil, electrolyte power packets, gum and other small items and these bags were able to accommodate it all.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow94

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the occasion.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags to give to my daughter who was celebrating her 21st birthday and to her friends. The girls were going away for an overnight. The girls loved the bags and so did I b/c they fit so many mini toiletries. They’re a perfect size to fit into your pocketbook or travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Polzella

customer_reviews.title: Wedding memento gift
customer_reviews.text: Included them in welcome bags for a destination wedding - guest found them cute. No one mentioned typo - lol. Filled with asprin, pepto bismal, travel toothbrush/paste, chapstick, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ben2 bizzyshoppin

customer_reviews.title: such a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: We are doing a destination wedding and these will be perfect for our bridal party gifts! thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great size. I use them at work for gifts for hotel guests but these are a wonderful bachelorette or party gift!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bachelorette party gift!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in good condition, exactly as described. They were perfect for stuffing with various hangover remedies (advil, tums, vitamin c, hair ties, etc.)

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Filled them with various hang over remedies for our guests for our destination wedding. Good quality- worked perfectly!

customer_reviews.text: Loved these little bags! They were a great touch for the party and fun little giveaways. There isn't much give though, so be aware of the size when picking items to fill the bags.

product_meta.title: Ling's moment 4x6 inches 10pcs Bachelorette Party Hangover Kit Bags Hangovers Bag Cotton Drawstring Wedding Party Welcome Favor Bags
product_meta.description: Size:4x6 InchLing’s moment “Hangover” muslin favor bags Product Specs Natural muslin favor bag with a drawstring closure and stamped with “hangover” message Dimensions: Approx: 6” L x 4” W. Materials: Cotton,drawstring Package: Sold in sets of 10 Product Description Planning a back-to-basics event?These personalized natural cotton wedding favor bags are a must. For anyone charmed by vintage style! The familiar feel or cotton comes back again and again as a reminder of life’s true simplicity. This cute anchor recovery kit favor bags are ideal for bachelorette party favors and accessories, wedding welcome kits, wedding receptions, bridesmaid favor, bridal shower parties and bachelor parties. Please note that due to the nature of handmade products,the natural fabric and screen printing by hand there may be slight variations between each printed bag.Just adds to the rustic charm! Care Instructions: Dry clean only.Iron with medium-high heat and a buffer sheet between iron and cotton.Air outside for minimum for 48 hours or iron repeatedly on low heat to remove natural odor. Have a suggestion? Tell us about it!
feature_bullets: 4" x 6" inch hangover kit bags perfect for bachelorette parties and wedding favors.
Natural muslin favor bag with a drawstring closure and stamped with black “hangover” message.
Measure 4 x 6 Inches Cream Off-White in Color, Sold in sets of 10.

These bags had a cute design and were sturdy enough material to put 4 or 5 small items in like gum, hand sanitizer, makeup remover, and aspirin or able to fill them up with hair ties, gum, emergen-C, advil, breath mints, etc and tied them to mini water bottles.
This wedding favor bag is perfect for hangover kits, bachelorette parties or any party especially wedding events. They are inexpensive and a great way to liven up any party .
